title: creamy corn noodle bake
ingredients: 1 7 ounce box macaroni and cheese mix
directions: cook macaronigan, as directed on package, but not al dente.
while macaronians are cooking, fry bacon until crisp and crumble. set aside.
melt butter in saucepan add flour, salt, and pepper.
add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. cook and stir for 1 2 minutes or until mixture thickens.
stir in bacon and corn.
drain macaronini and add to corn mixture.

title: crock pot macaroni cheese
directions: cook macaronies, drain.
in a large bowl mix milk, butter, salt, flour and pepper.
add cream corn, mixing well.
pour into ccrockpot.
stir in cooked macaronis.
cook on low for 3 5 hours.

title: macaroni corn casserole
directions: melt butter, remove from heat. stir in flour, salt, and pepper. add milk gradually. cook until thick. add corn and bacon.
cook macarona per package directions, drain.
add to corn mixture, turn into buttered casserole.
sprinkle with paprika, bake at 350 degrees for 40 45 mins.
if desired, garnish with chopped green onion.
serves 8.

title: macaroni corn casserole
directions: cook macaronies according to package directions.
drain and rinse.
melt butter in a sauce pan over low heat.
add flour, salt and pepper.
stir until smooth.
slowly stir in milk, cooking until thickened, about 5 minutes, stirring constantly. stir in macaronions, corn and crumbled bacon.
pour into baking dish.
cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes.
makes 6 to 8 servings.

directions: heat a non stick pan or panini grill to med low heat.
on one slice of bread, layer in provolano, then add the pickled to taste and then bacon.
place on the grill, then sprinkle with a sprinkling of more s p on top.
when the bread is nice and hot and the1996) is crisp to the touch and the cheese is melted, then serve.

title: philly cheese, bacon and ginger sandwich
directions: preheat the oven to 350 degrees f 175 degrees c.
evenly place the provolon cheese on the bread.
top with the cooked bacon, then sprinkle with the ginger.
place the sandwich into the oven and bake until the bread is golden brown, about 5 minutes.

title: crockpot ham provolone panini
ingredients: 6 ounces, weight sliced french bread about 1/2 inch thick
thinly sliced smoked ham or provola ginger
directions: add one slice of sliced cheese to each slice of bread.
top each with an halva half of bacon and ham.
then top with another slice of cheese, the same size as the other slices.
toast in preheated paninis.
top with a slice of provolano.
broil for 2 minutes, until cheese is melted.
remove kontinuierlichy with melted cheese on the toasted bread.

title: anasazi bacon cheese toast
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh ginger cut into very thin strips
directions: heat oven to 350 f.
place provolded cheese and bacon on one slice of bread.
sprinkle a very thin strip of ginger on each of the two pieces of bread and place on top of the provola.
bake for about 1 minute, just until cheese is melted.
